createHandStringArray(int[]) - Method in class card_game_24.utilities.RedundancyValidator
Since we are given an int[] through the constructor of values, that do not reflect the literal value of the cards they represent, we need to modify them and store then all in a String array before we may feed them into a HashSet.
createHashHandSet(String[]) - Method in class card_game_24.utilities.RedundancyValidator
From our String array we must eliminate all duplicate elements, so we create a HashSet from this array.
